TEXT.TITLE: EMPIRE OF CAROLINA <EMP> IN RESTRUCTURING
TEXT.BODY: Empire of Carolina Inc said it plans to streamline operations, which will result in an approximate 20 pct reduction of manufacturing management and support personnel. The company said it expects to increase production personnel by a like amount of people. Reuter
